title: Maharashtra AI policy for agriculture laudable but implementation weak, says NCP (SP) leader
description: Mumbai, Feb 28 (PTI) Senior NCP (SP) leader Jayant Patil on Saturday said Maharashtra’s artificial intelligence (AI) policy for agriculture is a welcome step but its implementation has been slow. He also raised concerns over farmers’ income, crop prices and rural infrastructure. Participating in a debate in the assembly, he said it was encouraging that […]
content:
